additionalExperience.title: Additional Experience
additionalExperience.text: In my free time I like to learn about new technologies and frameworks, that's why probably you won't see them listed as part of my work Experience, but if you are interested in my experience on those Technologies and Frameworks you can visit My Projects section and expand each of those to learn more about what I do in my free time.

experience.description: As a Senior Front-End Engineer at Oracle, I am member of the Team who are developing Oracle Data Visualization, more specific creating Data Flows Project. Doing Code Reviews and leading a couple of new members, advising them on follow the best practices on the development process.
Gave support and developed some of the Oracle Data Visualization features mainly for Mobile, product to analyze and visualize data.
Developed the Mobile Web App to renew policies for cars and motorcycles.
Gave ideas for the creation of current new responsive design for Univision’s News site.
Developed a website for a landscaping company.
Developed client's websites for local businesses in the city.
